content.rendered:
Directed by Shivam Nair.

Written by Rajshri Sudhakar.

Cast Taapsee Pannu(Shabana Khan). Akshay Kumar(Ajay Singh Rajput). Manoj Bajpayee(Ranvir Singh). Taher Shabbir(Jai Pal). Veerendra Saxena(Cableman (as Virendar Saxena)). Prithviraj Sukumaran(Tony / Mikhail). Danny Denzongpa(Feroz Ali Khan). Anupam Kher(Om Prakash Shukla). Madhurima Tuli(Anjali Singh Rajput). Murli Sharma(Jagdish Gupta – Minister’s PA). Zakir Hussain(Aseem Gupta – Raw Agent). Mohan Kapur(College Professor (as Mohan Kapoor)). Rajesh Bhati(Mikhail – before Cosmetic Surgery). Manav Vij(Ravi – RAW Agent). Aman Uppal(Wasim – RAW Agent). Natasha Rastogi(Farida Begum – Shabana’s Mother). Elli Avrram(Sona). Majid Jian Bagherpour(Malik). Bhuvan Arora(Karan). Jagannath Nivangune(Insp. Kulkarni). Nirvaan Bishnoi(Karan’s Friend). Shiva Dagar(Karan’s Friend). Abrar Quadir Khan(Karan’s Friend). Divyangana Jain(Priya – Shabana’s Friend). Sanjay Udeshi(Jai’s Father). Aparna Upadhyay(Jai’s Mother). Divya Aggarwal(Seema – Shabana’s Collegemate). Vikram Mehra(Shoaib – Shabana’s Collegemate). Arjun Singh Shekhawat(Prashant – Shabana’s Collegemate). Amarjeet Singh(RAW Informer at Market). Arbendra Pratap Singh(Assassin at Market). Vikram Singh(Cab Driver – Raw Agent). Rakesh Singh(Shabana’s Father). Hitesh Sejpal(Hospital Doctor). Shibani Dandekar(Spl. Appearence – song Baby Besharam). Darshana Bile(Sujata Raina – Kudo Player). Jatin Naik(Sujata’s Coach). Aishwarya Saste(Sujata’s Opponent). Bhaskar BV(RAW Agent). Gyanesh Moga(RAW Agent). Rajesh(RAW Agent). Ashish Shahmal(RAW Agent). Digvijay Singh(RAW Agent). Sanjeev Kumar Singh(Surgeon at KL). Vikram Shankar Singh(Raw Agent (as Vikram Singh)). Alok Bhardwaj(Saurabh (uncredited)). Rohan Choudhari(Intern (uncredited)). RoksolanaHasekiHÃ¼rrem(Club Dancer (uncredited))

Language Hindi.

Producers Aruna Bhatia. Shital Bhatia. Ouch. Ravi Sarin. Karan Shah. Rajesh Shah. Sandeep Shandilya. Sameer Siddiqui.

Production Friday Filmworks. Cape of Good Films.
